features: Washing Machine Cleaner: Our liquid laundry machine cleaner can be used with all loader styles and with all top brands such as for LG, Hotpoint, Frigidaire, GE, Samsung, Bosch, Magic Chef, Miele, Whirlpool and all other household names

Easy to use! The Best Clean For Your Machine! Our cleaner has been formulated to give the best possible clean which can extend the life of your machine. Simply pour 1/2 the bottle into the washer or detergent reservoir and run a large cycle on hot water.
Combat Washer Odors And Build-up: Designed to eliminate foul odors, limescale and other build-up. Our washing machine cleaner will help return that fresh smell to your clean laundry!
Concentrated & Non-toxic! Our washer cleaner is not only highly effective but also has no scent or fragrance, is Non-Corrosive, Non-Toxic, Zero VOC and Fully Biodegradable!
Made in the USA: Excellent value twin pack contains 2 bottles with 2 uses per bottle! That's a total of 4 uses!
body.description: Impresa Products - Washing Machine Cleaner We have formulated our laundry machine cleaner to be not only highly effective but also 100% safe and non-toxic/corrosive. Our product comes in a package of 2 bottles for a total of 4 uses and is made right here in the USA. We have specifically formulated our cleaner to combat odors, remove limescale and eradicate residue which can build up after long machine use. If used regularly our machine washer cleaner can prolong the life of your machine - we recommend using every 2-3 months for the best possible results. Highly versatile - can be used with all loader types such as front, top, HE and Non-HE; it has also been designed to use with all known brands such as LG, Hotpoint, Frigidaire, GE, Samsung, Bosch, Magic Chef, Miele, Whirlpool. For usage please refer to your manufacturers cleaning instructions and the guide found on our bottle. Key features: -Liquid formula Combats limescale, odors and other build-up -Helps in returning the fresh smell back to your laundry -Non-Corrosive Non-Toxic Zero VOC Fully Biodegradable -Made in the USA -Twin Pack 4 total uses-Use on virtually all branded and loader type machines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really great as a cleaner!
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent washing machine cleaner. I've used on monthly basis to keep the washing machine clean & smelling fresh. There is no odor after I use the cleaner. I highly recommend this product for it works. If you miss & don't do every month every two months it still smells fresh. I used just plain vinegar with baking soda and in the past, but I like this better for there is no odor after use and it's very convient. As for a septic tank household I'm not sure if this washing machine cleaner will work on septic systems??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I just used it this past weekend. The washer was getting a little musty from washing ferret laundry. I poured a little in the softener dispenser and cleaned it with a toothbrush. Put the rest of the bottle in the bottom of the washer tub and ran a full hot wash. Seems to have cleaned well. The musty smell is gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Good price. I’m assuming it works but really can’t tell since I did not have a major odor issue with my washer. I recommend it for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2019
reviews.reviewText: After reading reviews on this product, I decided to try it. Our front-loader had a strong odor coming from it. I tried other products, without much luck. I ran this product through the cleaning cycle and then wiped the drum clean with it. I ran another cycle and I noticed the odor was gone. I will buy more of this for machine maintenance. I am very pleased. For the first time in a while, our washer doesn’t smell bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Use for maintenance, not repair
reviews.reviewText: Trying to get rid of the front loader odor, but I swear it made it worse. To be fair, the gasket is terrible and I have ordered a replacement, but I was hoping to avoid that project. I have a feeling that if I just used this as regular maintenance, it would be very beneficial, but it’s not going to fix an aged and stinky door gasket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solved my washer issue!
reviews.reviewText: My 20+ year old Maytag washer would not go into the final spin cycle. Replaced belt and looked it over for issues. Finally figured out the washer was thinking there were still suds in the laundry! Tried the Affresh washing machine cleaner, and it left a residue in the tub, and the washing machine still had the issue. Bought and tried this washing machine cleaner, it cleaned out the Affresh mess, and fixed the machine. I plan on using it now every few months now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Didn't saw any difference
reviews.reviewText: I truly don't see any difference, between this product and less expensive product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I use this about once a month. We have puppies so I wait and use it right after washing the dog blankets/toys!! It smells nice; not overpowerful. I have a top loading washer now. The front loaders do have a problem with mold and mildew in the gasket that is hard to control. I will definitely be buying again.
